item.title: HCA 医疗保健公司因医疗保健需求强劲而利润增加
item.description: 医院运营商 HCA Healthcare 周五表示，由于流感病例增加，更多的人接受了选择性手术和就医，其第一季度利润增长了近 9%。【原文：Hospital operator HCA Healthcare said on Friday its first-quarter profit rose nearly 9%, as more people underwent elective procedures and sought medical care due to a rise in flu cases.】

item.title: 艾伯维因新型免疫药物销售强劲而上调盈利预期
item.description: 艾伯维周五上调了 2025 年的利润预期，此前其较新的免疫学药物 Skyrizi 和 Rinvoq 的强劲销售帮助该公司第一季度盈利超过了华尔街的预期。【原文：AbbVie raised its 2025 profit forecast on Friday after strong sales of its newer immunology drugs Skyrizi and Rinvoq helped the company beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter earnings.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，腾讯音乐正洽谈以 24 亿美元收购中国喜马拉雅
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，腾讯音乐娱乐集团正在就以 24 亿美元收购中国最大的在线音频平台喜马拉雅公司进行深入谈判。【原文：Tencent Music Entertainment Group is in advanced talks to buy China's largest online audio platform Ximalaya Inc for $2.4 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 由于成本增加，保险经纪公司 Aon 季度利润不及预期
item.description: 受支出增加的影响，保险经纪公司怡安周五未能达到华尔街对其第一季度利润的预期。【原文：Insurance brokerage firm Aon missed Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Friday, hurt by higher expenses.】

item.title: 特朗普称习近平给他打过电话，并在《时代》周刊采访中阐述了贸易和其他交易计划
item.description: 迄今为止，北京一直对美国对会谈的描述提出异议。【原文：Beijing has so far disputed the U.S. characterization of talks.】

item.title: 油田服务提供商 SLB 盈利不及预期，原因是国际市场疲软
item.description: 由于拉丁美洲对其油田设备和服务的需求放缓，拖累了其国际业务，SLB 周五公布的第一季度利润不及分析师预期。【原文：SLB missed analysts' estimates for first-quarter profit on Friday, as a slowdown in demand in Latin America for its oilfield equipment and services dragged its international business.】

item.title: 美国炼油商菲利普斯 66 季度亏损超出预期
item.description: 菲利普斯 66 周五公布的第一季度财报显示，由于美国炼油行业普遍进行检修和周转活动，炼油利润率下降，影响了公司业绩，导致亏损超过预期。【原文：Phillips 66 reported a bigger-than-expected loss in the first quarter on Friday, as lower refining margins amid a widespread maintenance and turnaround activity across the U.S. refining sector weighed on its performance.】

item.title: 墨西哥扩建最大港口，不惧特朗普关税押注全球贸易
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战引发了黯淡的前景，但墨西哥当局仍将赌注押在积极的经济增长和全球贸易的力量上，墨西哥最大海港的大规模扩建工程正在进行中。【原文：A massive expansion of Mexico's largest seaport is under way as Mexican authorities bet on positive economic growth and the strength of global trade despite the gloomy outlook sparked by U.S. President Donald Trump's trade wars.】

item.title: 日本是特朗普关税协议的一个试验案例。但谈判可能会很曲折。
item.description: 本月早些时候，东京最高贸易谈判代表在白宫与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普举行关税谈判时，向他赠送了一个金色的储蓄罐。【原文：When Tokyo's top trade negotiator met U.S. President Donald Trump for tariff talks at the White House earlier this month, he presented him with a gold-coloured piggy bank.】

item.title: 交易放缓，拉扎德第一季度利润下滑
item.description: 投资银行拉扎德（Lazard）周五公布，其第一季度调整后利润下降了9%，原因是关税和贸易战的可能性导致经济动荡，企业不愿进行交易。【原文：Investment bank Lazard reported a 9% drop in its first-quarter adjusted profit on Friday, as companies steered away from making deals amid economic turmoil due to tariffs and likelihood of a trade war.】

item.title: 据《时代》报道，特朗普称中国国家主席习近平给他打电话，美中正在进行贸易谈判
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五接受《时代》杂志采访时表示，他的政府正在与中国谈判以达成关税协议，而且中国国家主席习近平已经给他打过电话。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said his administration is talking with China to strike a tariff deal and that Chinese President Xi Jinping has called him, according to a Time magazine interview published on Friday as Beijing continues to dispute U.S. characterization of talks.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，丰田董事长提议可能以 420 亿美元收购丰田工业公司
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，丰田汽车董事长丰田章男已提议收购供应商丰田工业，交易金额可能达到 6 万亿日元（418 亿美元）。【原文：Toyota Motor Chairman Akio Toyoda has proposed the acquisition of supplier Toyota Industries in a possible 6 trillion yen ($41.8 billion) deal, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 早安哇，我们已经成功一半了
item.description: 今天美国和全球市场的重要事件，作者：Alun John，欧洲、中东和非洲地区即时新闻通讯员，金融与市场【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today, by Alun John, EMEA Breaking News Correspondent, finance and markets】

item.title: 比亚迪第一季度利润翻番
item.description: 比亚迪第一季度利润同比增长 100.4%，创下近两年来的最快增速，这家中国电动汽车巨头通过发起一场聪明的电动汽车价格战，扩大了其在竞争激烈的国内市场的领先优势。【原文：BYD's first-quarter profit leapt 100.4% from a year earlier, the fastest pace in nearly two years, as the Chinese electric vehicle giant extends its lead in its competitive home market by launching a smart EV price war.】

item.title: 华尔街因中国关税减免迹象和乐观的 Alphabet 财报而上涨
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货跳涨，此前有迹象表明中国准备软化其关税立场，而重磅股Alphabet好于预期的季度业绩也提振了其股价，并为其他科技股提供了支撑。【原文：U.S. stock index futures jumped on Friday after signs China was prepared to soften its stance on tariffs, while better-than-expected quarterly results from heavyweight Alphabet lifted its shares and supported other technology stocks.】

item.title: 巴拉圭豆农乘坐关税战 "雪橇
item.description: 对于巴拉圭的大豆种植者和出口商来说，全球贸易关税战是一场不可预测的旅程，让他们担心波动的影响，同时也希望中国对南美豆粕和豆油有更多的需求。【原文：For Paraguay's soy farmers and exporters, the global trade tariff war is an unpredictable ride that makes them fear the effects of volatility and also hope for more Chinese demand for South American soy meal and oil.】

item.title: 油价下挫，美国页岩补丁放缓
item.description: 由于原油价格跌至多年来的低点，加上高额关税导致建筑成本上升，美国一些小型页岩油生产商正在为石油钻探踩刹车。【原文：Some small U.S. shale producers are putting the brakes on oil drilling as crude prices sink to multi-year lows and steep tariffs drive construction costs higher.】

item.title: 中国美国商会主席称制药公司已报告中国进口产品关税豁免情况
item.description: 总部设在北京的美国商会周五表示，制药行业的公司报告称，在过去的一周里，他们能够以免征关税的方式向中国进口药品。【原文：The Beijing-based American Chamber of Commerce said on Friday that companies in the pharmaceutical sector had reported that they had been able to import drugs to China over the past week with tariff exemptions.】

item.title: 中国平安保险第一季度利润下降 26.4
item.description: 中国平安保险（集团）股份有限公司周五公布第一季度净利润下降 26.4%。【原文：Ping An Insurance (Group) Co of China Ltd reported a 26.4% decline in first-quarter net profit on Friday.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国寻求与印度就电子商务、农作物和数据存储达成贸易协议
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，正在讨论的美印贸易协定将涵盖 19 个类别，包括扩大农产品、电子商务、数据存储和关键矿产的市场准入。【原文：A U.S.-India trade agreement under discussion will cover 19 categories, including greater market access for farm goods, e-commerce, data storage and critical minerals, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 汽车制造商急于满足中国对长程混合动力汽车的激增需求
item.description: 中国汽车制造商和外国竞争对手正在推出更先进的长程混合动力汽车，以满足全球最大汽车市场不断增长的需求。【原文：Chinese automakers and foreign rivals are launching ever more advanced long-range hybrids to meet rising demand in the world's largest auto market.】

item.title: 部长称三星将向印度南部工厂投资 1.17 亿美元
item.description: 韩国三星电子公司将投资 100 亿卢比（1.1709 亿美元）建设其在印度南部的工厂，一位部长周五表示，数月前，该工厂曾因员工停职而面临工人抗议。【原文：South Korea's Samsung Electronics will invest 10 billion rupees ($117.09 million) in its facility in southern India, a minister said on Friday, months after the plant faced worker protests following employee suspensions.】

item.title: 人工智能推动测试发展，日本 Advantest 预计年利润增长 6
item.description: 日本芯片测试设备制造商 Advantest 周五预测，受人工智能任务所用芯片测试工具需求的推动，其下一财年的营业利润将增长 6%。【原文：Japanese chip testing equipment maker Advantest forecast its operating profit to grow 6% next fiscal year on Friday, buoyed by demand for its testing tools for chips used in the artificial intelligence tasks.】

item.title: RWE 已停止在美国的海上风电活动
item.description: 鉴于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）执政期间的监管不确定性，RWE 公司首席执行官在该公司年度股东大会前发表的一份演讲稿中表示，RWE 暂时停止了其在美国的海上风电活动。【原文：RWE has stopped its U.S. offshore wind activities for now in light of regulatory uncertainty under the administration of President Donald Trump, its CEO said in a speech manuscript published ahead of the utility's annual general meeting.】

item.title: 日本野村集团首席财务官表示，年度利润创历史新高，可应对波涛汹涌的市场
item.description: 日本最大的投资银行和经纪商野村控股第四季度净利润增长了 27%，创下了有史以来最高的全年利润，原因是该公司各业务部门的收入均比去年同期有所增长。【原文：Japan's biggest investment bank and brokerage Nomura Holdings recorded a 27% rise in fourth-quarter net profit to hit its highest ever full year profit as revenue grew in each of its business segments over the year.】

item.title: 英特尔股价因预期不佳而下挫
item.description: 周五，英特尔股价在法兰克福的激烈交易中下跌近4%，前一天英特尔还发布了营收和利润的下调预期，投资者对中美贸易战背景下芯片行业的前景感到担忧。【原文：Intel shares dropped almost 4% in heavy trading in Frankfurt on Friday after issuing downbeat forecasts for both revenue and profit the day before, as investors fretted about the outlook for the chip sector against the backdrop of the U.S./China trade war.】

item.title: 营收超出预期，Alphabet 法兰克福上市股票上涨
item.description: 谷歌母公司 Alphabet 的法兰克福上市股票周五早盘上涨超过 6%，因为这家科技巨头周四的季度营收超过了华尔街的预期。【原文：Google parent Alphabet's Frankfurt-listed shares rose over 6% in early trade on Friday after the tech giant beat Wall Street estimates for quarterly revenue on Thursday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯 Yandex 公司第一季度收入增长 34
item.description: 俄罗斯互联网巨头 Yandex 公布第一季度收入增长 34%，达到 3 065 亿卢布（37.1 亿美元），主要得益于电子商务以及搜索和门户业务的增长。【原文：Russian internet giant Yandex reported a 34% rise in first-quarter revenue to 306.5 billion roubles ($3.71 billion), driven by growth in e-commerce and its search and portal business.】

item.title: 汽车制造商在上海车展上推出影院体验和迷你厨房
item.description: 汽车制造商希望在不断创新的中国汽车市场中脱颖而出，在本周的上海车展上推出了配备沉浸式娱乐、香味控制、车载冰箱甚至火锅烹饪设备的汽车。【原文：Car manufacturers looking to stand out in China's constantly innovating auto market unveiled cars at Shanghai's auto show this week featuring immersive entertainment, fragrance control, in-car refrigerators and even hot pot cooking equipment.】

item.title: 重组亏损预示扭亏为盈，日产汽车股价上涨
item.description: 由于资产价值大幅缩水和巨额重组费用（这些费用似乎旨在为急需的扭亏为盈扫清障碍），日产汽车公布了创纪录的亏损，其股价周五上涨了近 2%。【原文：Nissan saw its shares rise almost 2% on Friday after it flagged a record loss due to a massive reduction in the value of its assets and hefty restructuring fees - costs that appeared aimed at clearing the decks for a badly needed turnaround.】
